column5: strange problem I am having with my Talon, sometimes when it gets deployed it doesnt want to come back up. I hit the button on both remotes and nothin...switch on the talon...nothin. It just clicks like it wants to do something but nothing happens.The strange part of this is, all I have to do is turn my master off then back on and it come back up when I press the button on the talon it self. Kinda annoying!Anyone ever had this happen?I have it wired to a 30amp (may be a 20 amp have to double check that) fuse under the console on the central fuse block. Fuse is still good never had to switch it, and was brand new 4 weeks ago when the talon was installedAny help would be greatThanks
All your connections tight?  Almost seems like a loose connection somewhere.  S.

Sounds to me like the master is reseting the motor?,but turning the switch off and on is quite common in the electrical machine industry to reset something. Having said that ,you have a issue for sure.Hope you get it figured out.Overload spike?.

All your connections tight?  Almost seems like a loose connection somewhere.  S.   I checked the ground to see if that was loose, seems tight.  The depth indicator lights stay on so I know it got power.
Does it beep when trying to retract. Have you used the wash port to clean the talon. Had zippo for issues with mine other than getting stuck in soft botoms

Does it beep when trying to retract. Have you used the wash port to clean the talon. Had zippo for issues with mine other than getting stuck in soft botoms   The day after it first happened I washed it out and lubed it as per the directions.  It is happening almost every time now, no beeps, it just clicks...almost like its trying to push it down again.  If i press the up button repeatedly the bottom depth light turns off then the next press it goes up.  Or i reset the master, I think i need a call into Minn Kota for this 1, it really baffles me  I have a video but no clue how to get the vid on here yet, do i need to go through youtube?
You tube is easy and fast.
Relay/board problem most likely. Grant at boat tech in pickering is a cert. Minn kota reapir centre
secondary stage latch bring it to aikmans
secondary stage latch bring it to aikmans  Where is Aikmans?  Seems like it could be the issue.  Thanks guys!!!
Check your voltage on your batteries. I just went through a pile of troubleshooting on mine and it was a 2 yr old battery that was shot. Put a new one in and away she went.  Rob C
Aikman's in Mississauga  3010 Novar Rd. Mississauga, Ont. L5B 1S4  905-277-3595
Or a loose/bad connection somewhere.  S.

Check your voltage on your batteries. I just went through a pile of troubleshooting on mine and it was a 2 yr old battery that was shot. Put a new one in and away she went.  Rob C  I did not check this, however the battery is brand new about 3 weeks ago.  I will hook this direct to a known good battery and see if it changes.
Yes, start at the talon and work r way back. Hook it to a known good battery, and go from there. I bet it works fine right off the good batt. Seen it many, many times.  S.
